title: cmd/godoc: method click target in TOC is small and weird
body:
The godoc table of contents click target to get to a method has become a little
ridiculous after the recent type-cross-linking changes.

See screenshot.

The only valid place to click is "func (receiver".

The name of the method doesn't even scroll the page down.
Attachments: 1. click-target.png (54126 bytes)
